A Check to debauchery, and other crying sins of these times with several useful rules for the attaining the contrary virtue : to which are annexed some directions and heads for meditation and prayer, taken out of Holy Scripture ... Oct. 26. 92 ... L. D.
[16], 149, [1] p.
Printed for Richard Butt ... : and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, London : 1692.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Epistle to the Reader, signed L.D. Attributed to L.D. cf. NUC pre-1956. Table of contents: p. [11]-[16] Errata: p. [1] at end.
=======

[16], 149, [1] p.
Printed for Richard Butt ... : and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, London : 1692.
